name: ShutUp & BOWL
description:
Virtual Reality game all about bowling to cause as much destruction and unlock achievements. 

 You are ready to bowl but the bowling alley is tired of your antics so you go to the local supermarket to meet up with your friends and think, "yes this would be the perfect place to get your bowl on"!  Knock down the pins to progress and cause as much chaos and damage along the way.  Be on the look out to uncover hidden achievements.

This is my first game and I would love feedback. anyone wanting to beta test?

http://discord.gg/AZxHbaWTYd

Special thanks to sir_fansi gamedev for his wonderful vr tutorials that helped in the creation of this game. https://www.youtube.com/c/fansiart
